name: Ehealth
body:
# eHealth
## eHealth Demonstration

In Australia we have a government that wants to dig up a few hundred million acres and give everyone **FTTH** internet access.  Apart from the poor souls that live in the bush.

One of the justifications for a $90 BILLION spend has been **'eHealth'**.

I know a little about that subject so I put together a web site that discusses various aspects of the bag that is eHealth, and generally why you don't need super fast internet access to do any of the subjects under discussion/speculation.

It is available for viewing here

http://ehealth.addinall.org



***
> He is so old that his blood type was discontinued.

Mark Addinall

addinall@addinall.net
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
